text: Barbara Ann Mikulski (July 20, 1936) was an American politician. In January 2007, she became the senior United States Senator from Maryland. She is a member of the U.S. Democratic Party. Mikulski was first elected to the United States House of Representatives in 1986. She was elected to the Senate in 1986. Mikulski is the longest serving woman in the history of the United States Congress. Senator Mikulski retired in 2017. Mikulski was born in Baltimore, Maryland. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:United States representatives from Maryland Category:United States senators from Maryland
title: Barbara Mikulski
